title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform with rifle, revolver, and sword] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform with rifle, revolver, and sword] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.5 x 8.3 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather, oval and scroll design. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: United States.--Army.--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870. Handguns--1860-1870. Daggers & swords--1860-1870. Rifles--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.32137 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2814
